definitions.definition: ( relational ) Of or relating to the mind or specifically the total emotional and intellectual response of an individual to external reality .

subdefinitions.definition: Of or relating to intellectual as contrasted with emotional activity.
Of, relating to, or being intellectual as contrasted with overt physical activity.
Occurring or experienced in the mind .
Relating to the mind , its activity , or its products as an object of study .
Relating to spirit or idea as opposed to matter .

definitions.definition: Of, relating to, or affected by a psychiatric disorder .

subdefinitions.definition: ( relational ) Intended for the care or treatment of persons affected by psychiatric disorders .
( colloquial , UK , Ireland , Australia , New Zealand , dated in the US , Canada , comparable ) Mentally disordered ; insane , mad , crazy .
examples: He is the most mental freshman I've seen yet.

definitions.definition: ( colloquial , UK , Ireland , Australia , New Zealand , comparable ) Enjoyable or fun , especially in a frenetic way.
examples: That was a mental party last night.

definitions.definition: Of or relating to telepathic or mind-reading powers.

main_definition: ( relational ) Of or relating to the mind or specifically the total emotional and intellectual response of an individual to external reality .
secondary_definitions: Of, relating to, or affected by a psychiatric disorder .
( colloquial , UK , Ireland , Australia , New Zealand , comparable ) Enjoyable or fun , especially in a frenetic way.
Of or relating to telepathic or mind-reading powers.

definitions.definition: Of or relating to the chin or median part of the lower jaw , genial .
examples: the mental nerve, the mental region

definitions.definition: Of or relating to the chinlike or liplike structure .

main_definition: ( anatomy , relational ) Of or relating to the chin or median part of the lower jaw , genial .
secondary_definitions: ( biology , relational ) Of or relating to the chinlike or liplike structure .
